system.sustained:
In response to a target within range using a Psychic Power, psyker makes Opposed Willpower Test vs Target. If Psyker Succeeds, target still manifests power but must make a Psychic Phenomena Roll (in addition to any others they make). For each Degree of Success, they add +5 to the Psychic Phenomena Roll. If the target succeeds the Opposed Test, they manifest their power unimpeded.
For the next 1d5 Turns, the target suffers -5 to all Focus Power Tests unless spending a Half Action to refocus themselves.
If the target rolls double on their Focus Power Test they also manifests the Warp Ghosts Psychic Phenomena in addition to regular effects.
